Example: s3://<bucket-name>/<path-to-binaries>'}, u'Parameters': [u'IgniteCodeLocation', u'IgniteconfigCodeLocation', u'awssdklocation'], u'Label': {u'default': u'S3 bucket name for Ignite code'}}, {u'Description': {u'default': u'Enter Cluster Information'}, u'Parameters': [u'CacheName', u'JavaVersion', u'CacheReplicas'], u'Label': {u'default': u'Ignite Cluster Information'}}]

{u'Fn::Base64': {u'Fn::Join': [u'', [u'#! /bin/bash -v
', u'mkdir -p /home/ec2-user/ignite 
', u'cd /home/ec2-user/ignite 
', u'until ping -c 1 google.com 
', u'do 
', u'sleep 5; 
', u'done 
', u'aws s3 cp ', {u'Ref': u'IgniteCodeLocation'}, u' ignite.zip 
', u'unzip ignite.zip 
', u'mv `ls|grep -v ignite.zip` ignite 
', u'cd ignite 
', u'aws s3 cp ', {u'Ref': u'awssdklocation'}, u' aws-sdk.jar 
', u'cp aws-sdk.jar libs/ 
', u'cp libs/optional/ignite-aws/*.jar libs/ 
', u'echo "', {u'Ref': u'CacheName'}, u'" > /tmp/cachename.data 
', u'echo "', {u'Ref': u'CacheReplicas'}, u'" > /tmp/cachereplicas.data 
', u'echo "', {u'Ref': u'S3Bucket'}, u'" > /tmp/s3bucket.data 
', u'aws s3 cp ', {u'Ref': u'IgniteconfigCodeLocation'}, u' configureIgnite.sh 
', u'chmod +x configureIgnite.sh 
', u'./configureIgnite.sh $(cat /tmp/cachename.data) $(cat /tmp/cachereplicas.data) $(cat /tmp/s3bucket.data) ', {u'Ref': u'Igniteaccesskey'}, u' ', {u'Fn::GetAtt': [u'Igniteaccesskey', u'SecretAccessKey']}, u' 
', u'cp config/default-config.xml  config/default-config.xml.backup 
', u'cp /tmp/igniteconfig.xml config/default-config.xml 
', u'nohup bin/ignite.sh -J-Xms$(cat /tmp/heapsize.log) -J-Xmx$(cat /tmp/heapsize.log) & 
', u'# Helper function
', u'function error_exit
', u'{
', u'  /opt/aws/bin/cfn-signal -e 1 --reason="$1" --stack ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::StackName'}, u' --region ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::Region'}, u'  --resource=IgniteFleet 
', u'  exit 1
', u'}
', u'# Install packages
', u'/opt/aws/bin/cfn-init -s ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::StackId'}, u' -r IgniteLaunchConfig ', u'    --region ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::Region'}, u'
', u'# All is well so signal success
', u'  /opt/aws/bin/cfn-signal -e 0 --reason="Ignitesetup complete" --stack ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::StackName'}, u' --region ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::Region'}, u'  --resource=IgniteFleet 
']]}}
